title: DiRT.4-RELOADED
description:
DiRT 4 (c) Codemasters

06/2017: RELEASE.DATE .. PROTECTION: Steam
1: DISC(S) .. GAME.TYPE: Racing, Simulation, Sports

DiRT 4 is all about embracing fear. It's about the thrill, exhilaration and
adrenaline that is absolutely vital to off-road racing. It's about loving
the feeling of pushing flat out next to a sheer cliff drop, going for the
gap that's too small and seeing how much air you can get. Be Fearless

1. Unrar
2. Burn or mount the image
3. Install the game
4. Copy over the cracked content from the /Crack directory on the image to
your game install directory
5. Play the game
6. Support the software developers. If you like this game, BUY IT!
